website_summaries.verdict: Jabra's Elite Active 75t earphones improve upon the original pair with a more secure fit and a waterproof design for a real true wireless winner.
pros: Powerful audio with thunderous bass and bright high
cons: Sculpted sound signature might be too much for some

website_summaries.verdict: The Jabra Elite 75t earphones fit securely and deliver bass-forward, powerful true wireless audio you can tune to your liking though an impressive companion app.
pros: Strong audio performance with serious bass depth and crisp highs
App has 5-band EQ and HearThrough mode, allows for Alexa and Google Assistant integration
cons: Default bass levels are overly boosted

customer_reviews.title: Requires a little burn-in time
customer_reviews.text: I've upgraded from the 65t's. These are the more subtle fit with extra sound. They did require a burn in period of 5-7 hours of play back for the bass to settle down. Out of the box it's (the bass) is really boomy, but once the drivers seltle in and the sound is great, still on the bassy side, but that app offers easy adjustment.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Average sound, not fully compatible with Garmin. Overpriced.
customer_reviews.text: Constant connection issues between phone and Garmin (sounds terrible on Garmin watch with no control over bass etc). Jabra have just confirmed that the buds are only optimised for use on smartphones and may not be compatible with smart watches. Fiddly buttons with unintuitive controls/sounds/lights. Annoying American voice prompts. The IP57 water proof rating means nothing, as when wet the buds will block up sound for 24 hours so don't waste your extra £20 on the useless upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Marketing_Guru

customer_reviews.title: Left ear bud keeps cutting off rubbish avoid
customer_reviews.text: Must avoid jabra has created good earbuds but this particular ones jabra elite 75t rubbish took me whole day to update and left ear bud keeps cutting off and can't used it so returned it next day do not purchase it.
customer_reviews.author: Bhisma

customer_reviews.title: Common fault with left bud not charging!
customer_reviews.text: I've only had these a week and I'm sick of them already... The left earbud doesn't charge (and thus cannot connect) This seems to be a common issue which was not picked up by any of the reviews on YouTube. I've contacted Jabra yesterday 48hrs ago but still to hear anything back from them which is even more frustrating. I'm desperately looking for the packaging because I'm just about ready to give these back & get a pair from one of the other tried & trusted brands.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Not fit for any activity.
customer_reviews.text: Waited a long time for these. Initially pleased with product. Main problem I found was they kept falling out. Advertised as being suitable for sports and gym. Despite trying everything and twice contacting manufacturers I could not get them to stay put. They would fall out even on a gentle walk. Clearly need fins added to design to keep them in. For price sound average and not great when linked to phone. Thankfully was able to get a full refund thanks to amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Jimbob

customer_reviews.title: Value for money - amazing sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, great quality and sound. Best headphones I have used and experienced.
customer_reviews.author: Sukh Mann

customer_reviews.title: Pathetic. Avoid.
customer_reviews.text: Utterly abysmal. Bluetooth is the worst standard ever created in all fairness but these headphones take that and run with it to a whole new level. If, and it's a big if, you can evet get them to connect (maybe a 5% chance), then enjoy the pathetic sound quality, constant hiss and outrageous latency that makes video calls undoable and watching video pointless. The worst thing I've ever bought. Worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look and feel quality, returned due to fit and connection issues
customer_reviews.text: The look, feel and sound from the Jabra 75t are excellent. Calls are great when working from home. The mute function in the left button is really useful on conference calls. However, they just don't stay in my ears, particularly the left one. It keeps falling out when just walking, never mind running. I've tried the different sized buds. Within the my house Bluetooth connection is fine with my Samsung Galaxy, but as soon as I go outside and move around they drop connection cutting out now and again when my phone is in my pocket. Returned to Amazon due to the fit and connection issues.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Bass
customer_reviews.text: On par with the AirPod pros for £80 less... and far superior to both of their predecessors. If you want the all round best true wireless earbuds these have my vote. I would recommend the Sennheiser momentums for pure sound quality and unreliability, and AirPod pros for active noise cancelling. However, these just feel and look amazing, and the bass... might be too much for some people😂. These are definitely the best true wireless earbuds on the market as of January 2020.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Left earbud goes silent....firmware issue!! Such a shame.....
customer_reviews.text: They have such potential, however the latest firmware resulted in the left earbud going silent, then the right started doing the same. For this money, I do not expect these problems. Such a shame....they’ve been returned.
customer_reviews.author: J. D. Hemms

customer_reviews.title: Quality buds
customer_reviews.text: So gutted I can't get on with these . Can't seem to get a secure fit . Have dropped out a few times now Having to be really careful with them . Sound quality is really good and the app works fine
customer_reviews.author: graham Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Two sets faulty out of the box. Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: First pair were faulty out of the box. Left earbud would not respond and the button didn’t work. Replacement delivered the next day. Left earbud crackled constantly and had intermittent connection with the right earbud, even before pairing with phone. When paired the problem caused the phone to cycle constantly between play and pause. Two for two faulty out of the box. There seems to be a manufacturing problem. I’ll return for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: roccoskildo

customer_reviews.title: Great product but does have a few issues
customer_reviews.text: I brought the 75t Ear Buds to replace a Plantronics Legend which failed in the same way 3 other units I had failed; rubber round ear split. I found the the 75t's build quality, functionality and controls are excellent and battery life is very good. Sound quality is OK and noise cancelling is not bad considering it is only passive. However, I did experience a couple of problems . There were brief dropouts of audio. The biggest problem was the units would drop out of my ears without much notice no matter how I forced them into my ears; so you have to be very careful with them and reseat them occasionally.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisG

customer_reviews.title: Very happy so far!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to replace some Sony WF-1000-MX's which were terrible. Immediately I put these Jabras in my ears they were a joy in comparison. Small and fits securely in my ears, but with a great rich deep sound. Controls are intuitive and easy to use. No active noise cancelling, but they sounded fine when out and about on the streets with competition from traffic, wind and people. They do cut out occasionally but I've found this is a feature of all wireless headphones, particularly when my phone is in my pocket. They are expensive, but I intended this as a luxury lockdown treat.
customer_reviews.author: R. HOW

customer_reviews.title: Good buy, would not say best, definitely scope for improvement.
customer_reviews.text: The earphones are good quality and works for long hours as claimed by Jabra. However, the microphone doesnot work with gaming apps which I feel is a downside. Tried contacting customer service, but they suggested that just try updating earphones but there was still no guarantee it would work as the gaming app is not a jabra app (it did not work) - most absurd response received in a long time. One of the buds do pinch the ear buds over prolonged use for more than an hour or so. Would definitely have liked to see it work seemlessly considering the price charged. Happy with the rest of it like shape, size, portability - sound quality is satisfactory.
customer_reviews.author: Ranadip

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous with iPhones, not with computers
customer_reviews.text: These are terrific little true wireless Bluetooth earphones with only one flaw. Firstly the good points - they are comfortable to wear, the sound is very good, the Jabra app is very good, the controls are good. Battery life is effectively over 20 hours, as every time you put them back in the battery case they top up again. Same as Apple AirPods et al. This is very good, and there is no “range anxiety” at all. The only flaw is that Jabra do NOT support using these with computers, even if they have built in Bluetooth. Honestly WTF? Definitely one star off for that which Jabra seriously need to reconsider.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Ridd

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound, Fantastic App
customer_reviews.text: I thought I'd pay a little more for a pair of quality earphones. So far, they've not disappointed. The sound is excellent, especially the bass notes. The app is very user friendly with high functionality. The earphones themselves look good and fit my ears to a tee. Well worth the expense. Brilliant, long battery life. My only criticism is that it is difficult managing the volume using the press-and-hold button on the earphones.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Style over substance
customer_reviews.text: I bought these alongside a pair of Jaybird Vista and even though the Jaybird Vista's have less features they are in my opinion better gym headphones. My main gripes: The fit in my ear, there was nothing holding them in my ear and I had to constantly re-insert them. The passive noise cancelling was minor and the audio quality was just ok. They lack the ability to work independently of each other. By comparison my Jaybird Vista's not only secure better in my ear but also work independently of each other and the audio quality was of a much higher standard.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: RELIABLE EARBUDS
customer_reviews.text: I received this product as part of a review program in return for an unbiased review. The earbuds are so convenient and easy to use once you get familiar to its function. Having Alexa Voice control helps a lot when you have disabilities and safety wise too. I would love to test the headphones which I saw in the shape. I use it for answering calls instead of having the phone on speaker. The battery life is fantastic lasts 3 days for me. The quality and the weight is great for someone who's disabled and have difficulty to use. Having tested the Earbuds I am more curious to try other products created by JABRA.
customer_reviews.author: S. RASHID

customer_reviews.title: Avoid
customer_reviews.text: Earplugs fell out of ear with each earpiece. Only had a week and lost left earplug into canal. Have contacted Amazon twice and no sensible response. I want full refund for product. My advice is whilst the build quality appears good, their weight in my experience leads them not to sit stably in ear whilst tonal options on app have little impact. These units are bass light. Avoid
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for anybody that loves dance music
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are a revelation. I've bought so many different brands and none of them seem to cut it when it comes to dance music. Never enough bass and never go loud enough. Until now. I can't take them off! The bass is driving, the quality absolutely spot on. I never need to have them on full volume. I don't care if they only last six months, I'd buy them again and again. At last a pair of headphones for people that like dance music. All the people moaning about too much bass, well I can send you multiple links to other headphones that you'll like then, but these are the business.
customer_reviews.author: DTG17

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, great sound , total customisation of sound And controls
customer_reviews.text: I love new app that allows you to customise sound, and also hearing test that sets them to any hearing frequency loss. Read a article about heavy base, but you have total control of this from app So article was disingenuous and biased toward Apple.You can also set button actions which is great. Instantly connects from case no messing on phone, use with phone Samsung 7, smart tv and iPad with no problem. Size great ,smaller than previous generation and don’t fall out. Microphone strong so phone conversation good.
customer_reviews.author: Gerard

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THEM
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THEM Stop working the left one after one month, from the beginning got issues with the sound on the left and sometimes don't connected. The worse service from Jabra, very irresponsible, not respond to enquires, asked me to returning to them when simple I can have send Mack to Amazon and get fast replacement. Already passed so many days and waiting from them to send me a replacement. The only contact with them is via emails and that answering only when they want to. Awful! I just asked for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm not an audiophile but think that sound quality is great - tailored to me by the MySound function in the app. I chose these particularly because they can connect to 2 devices at once. As I'm working from home due to COVID, I have them connected to my work iPhone 8 and my personal Samsung Galaxy S10 Lite with no problem. Only slight fault is that the Sound+ doesn't;t update the charge on the earpieces as it goes down - only if you put them back in the case and take them out again - so you are not sure how much charge is left
customer_reviews.author: Nick Roots

customer_reviews.title: On my second pair and again have left earbud problems
customer_reviews.text: With my first pair I was initially very impressed with sound quality and fit. After a couple of months the left earbud kept cutting out before giving up completely - it wouldn't charge. Jabra dealt with this very efficiently and I was sent a second pair. After just a couple of days, I'm again having problems - crackling in left ear and intermittent sound drops! I have updated firmware, fully de-charged/re-charged, paired/unpaired - then gave up and asked for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Adam M Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Really good Earbuds
customer_reviews.text: As long term heavy user/owner of Jabra Evolve65T - purchased the 75T as an upgrade. Much, much Smaller and better Sound Quality. Using the Jabra Sounds Apps is great - Being able to adjust Sound quality to each ear and also adjust tones etc really good. Battery life very good and not run out on me yet at 5+hrs. I only use for ‘everyday use’ Phone calls/ music/ radio and always travelling around with these in my ears ... Hear-through feature very good - cannot comment on waterproofing as try to and avoid gyms etc.... Really pleased with them and absolutely no regret in buying
customer_reviews.author: Robert Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Great all round TWS headphones - Perfect for mixed usage
customer_reviews.text: Jabra 75t TWS headphones are 5 star headphones So far I have used them for various activities – listening to audiobooks in bed (very comfy), running (stayed in without adjustment) and watching movies (No lip sync issues). Having used other premium TWS headphones, after a while, all of them suffered issues in one or more of these areas. So for, these are the best I have tried for comfort and fit. The sound quality is great – on par with the best. Slightly bass heavy to start with, but easily tuneable in the app. Charging case is compact and USB C charging is convenient. Magnetic retention of the buds is a nice touch Overall – fully recommended
customer_reviews.author: MR JAMES BOGGUST

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic earphones. The fit and sound quality is excellent. Base at 50% is mind blowing. The mids and treble are loud and crisp. They paired easily with my samsung S10. Also paired easily with Alexa and my CD receiver. The battery lasts around 6hrs. The charging case is fine. Wise it was a more visible colour. I keep displacing them . There might be a " find my buds" option somewhere in the app. In conclusion. Fantastic product. So good to be free of wires.
customer_reviews.author: A. ROBERTS

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Wow, sound quality is spot on , you forget youve got them in they are that comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Neilwat2001

customer_reviews.title: Fit great
customer_reviews.text: So far my review is only on fit and look of the earbuds. They are a gift to my husband after the leading make had a manufacturing flaw. So after a refund i bought jabra instead. They fit my ear perfectly. I will edit this review after my moroccan husband gets them (hes stuck in morocco unable to return because flights are stopped with the virus). But they look great Fit great. All the same features as his other ones. From what he sees he is delighted
customer_reviews.author: Jill A

customer_reviews.title: Great discreet & convenient buds
customer_reviews.text: I really like these buds, the sound quality is very good and they're very comfortable to wear and use. Some features that are neat and very helpful are the buds pausing when you remove one as if you're about to speak to someone. Likewise having 'passthrough' mode is great for when you're walking around and still want to be able to hear your surroundings. The case charges quickly itself and then charges the buds quickly when not in use. Recommend these
customer_reviews.author: Vindu

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: Not entirely sure about the "moisture wicking" side of things, but my dad loves these headphones Having been given a previous version as a gift a few years back and loving them, I then bought these for my father He is absolutely thrilled with them, the sound quality is fantastic and they are incredibly comfortable to wear The design has come a long way in just a few years, and the charging case is very compact I was very impressed Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Emily Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent earbuds. Best I’ve ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent earbuds. Love everything about them. They fit my ears well (AirPods just fall out and don’t fit me at all). Sound quality is great, as is passive noise cancellation. The ‘hear through’ feature is by favourite as it enables you to listen to your music and also be aware of your surroundings. The app is great and has regular updates. Recommend this to anyone who wants good quality earbuds with great sound and battery life. Especially if non in-ear earbuds don’t fit you
customer_reviews.author: KPK

customer_reviews.title: Great for working at home
customer_reviews.text: I'm really surprised at how good they are. Normally in ear headphones don't fit me, but these feel really secure. I bought these to help with working from home during lockdown as they do help with keeping me focused and not getting distracted. My only criticism is that the microphones do pickup alot of the ambient room noise. For extended video calls you still need a headset with a close microphone. But for extended periods of focused work these are great.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Sj Bourke

customer_reviews.title: Get these you will not be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Got these after having the Jaybird vistas. Loved the vistas but the jabra have more functionality much better call quality and the case holds a larger charge. Fit super well never had earbuds so comfortable and I have tried them all.
customer_reviews.author: TrevorB

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones with one niche flaw......
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the sound is great; the functionality is great (particularly the "hear through") and they are very comfortable to wear. So why one star deducted? Well, I was looking for a wireless headphone set that I could wear with my motorcycle helmet so that I can hear my sat-nav speaking when I do those (post covid) scenic trips round the UK. It looked like this product would do the job, but they stick out just enough to pull out of my ears when I take the helmet off and they end up on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic...
customer_reviews.text: after reading lots of reviews on these I decided to give them ago not the cheapest out there but for me worth it they have a great sound especially if you like a bit of base with your tunes :-) other functions work well Very good and easy app also which is easy to use and set up I am a Samsung fan but these just blew their pods out of the water for me I also tried other pods same results for me
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Near perfection
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleasantly surprised at how good these are. The in-ear fit is spot on for me; rock solid, not fallen out yet. Pairing with my iPhone was simplicity and there has been no drop out. You are never going to mistake these for a pair of studio quality cans but, for the price they are great. They are a bit bass-y and if listening to classical music, double basses are somewhat boomy but this is nothing that cannot be sorted with the very adequate equaliser in the free app. Does everything that it promises. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Miksza

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable wireless earbuds
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic wireless ear buds! The sound is very clear, and the buds are comfortable to wear. They are a great design! look good feel good very happy thank you.
customer_reviews.author: kel

customer_reviews.title: Frequently cut out when using with standalone Apple Watch
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love these Jabra Elite 75t Active earbuds and I did, whilst using them with my iPhone, but when I used them standalone with my Apple Watch (outdoor walking and running) they frequently cut out. So if you intend going out ‘light‘ and leaving your iPhone at home and relying on just your Apple Watch for music, I’d personally give these earbuds a wide birth. I reluctantly returned them to Amazon for a full refund and ordered a pair of Sennheiser Momentum 2 for £110 more, which work perfectly with my Apple Watch, so I’m now extremely happy!
customer_reviews.author: Gerry

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Sounds but too Big for My Ears
customer_reviews.text: These headphones give great sound, look very chic and the wireless charging case is sleek and stylish. The design is good but unfortunately my ears are on the small side and these were just too painful. The bud went in my ear then popped fully out of one ear with a little motion and half out of the other. They were still worth a try and the three sizes of ear gels are decent sizes and actually are the smallest ear gels I've seen.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: It's ok, a bit expensive for what it is
customer_reviews.text: It looks great, and fits well in the ear, but ultimately it is a bit too expensive for what it is. The sound quality was good but the speaker quality was not great as the sound was very muffled when I was making calls with this. The battery lasted a long time, and the app was intuitive, but for the price you would expect everything to be perfect and unfortunately the sound quality just needs improvement.
customer_reviews.author: tete

customer_reviews.title: Best wireless Earbuds for Android imo
customer_reviews.text: Best in-ears I've had to date and I've had Galaxy buds, Jaybird Vistas, Bose Soundsport free & a few more. I need a larger bud compared to other brands but the large do me fine. With the mediums they were inclined to slide out. Sound is great. Meaty but clear bass, mods & highs are easy to hear. Good sound stage too. Battery life is good. 7-8 hrs per charge and another 2-3 charges in the case.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Better than 65t
customer_reviews.text: After my 65t's died (full refund from Amazon) I needed a replacement. The headphones were bought as a gift for my 16yr old son. He said they fit and sound better than the 65t. I could have got these much cheaper on ebay but that would have no warranty. So after having a pair that died on me after 14 months it makes sense to pay and get legit warranty. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Marty James

customer_reviews.title: Great earbuds
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace my Jabra elite 65s which I had destroyed through "excessive mosture" due to turbo trainer workouts. The sound quality of these is excellent, as is the noise reduction. They do not feel as intrusive or as substantial as the 65s, and I was slightly worried they may fall out, but they have not done so yet. The controls are different and take a bit of getting used to, but overall great for exercising, and seem to be resilient to sweat.
customer_reviews.author: Noswale

customer_reviews.title: Brillant, forget all others
customer_reviews.text: OK i tried amazons, but they are poor, the advantage of these are two fold. One is they have there own app to get the perfect sound and they are way superior to echo buds. Which were a major let down. 2nd advantage is they work both with Google and Alexa. For me it's the sound and fit. They snuggle just right unlike many. Wish they added a hook type too like beats for added security of not losing etc. Recommend
customer_reviews.author: Michael James Jacob Fraser

customer_reviews.title: Fire risk
customer_reviews.text: Had the earphones for over a month and really enjoying them mainly using them for running. But sat in my bedroom this evening and an over powering smell of burning filled the room. I'd left these head phones unattended while charging on countless occasions. I feel sick with regards what could have happened. The charge case was so hot I was playing hot potato with it. How am I suppose to ever trust a Jabra product again after this experience?
customer_reviews.author: wilsey

customer_reviews.title: Worth the upgrade from Apple Airpods
customer_reviews.text: At first I didn’t know how to put these on properly and I hated it. But once you get it right and get the hang of it, wow. What a product. Sound quality and noise cancellation specifically is what blows me away. I lost my apple airpods and considered just buying another one, but opted for these as I heard so many good things about it for fitness activity. If you’re looking for buds that’s doesnt budge, this is the one! The gold colour makes it look even more fancy which I love. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle

customer_reviews.title: Metalhead Buds!
customer_reviews.text: Metal heads rejoice! finally a set of buds that can (with the awesome app equaliser) separate the thousands of musical layers so you can listen to each layer perfectly. Lamb of god..awesome, insomnium ? Wolfheartv? Amon amarth ? No problem, death metal , battle metal struggles on normal cans, not these... outstanding. I ha e bose qc35-2's also. These are better for metal.
customer_reviews.author: sabrewulf

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing truly wireless headphones. The sound does lean more toward bass but you can definitely tweak the sound settings within the app. They are much nicer in my opinion to the Apple AirPods and look far better. They’re very discreet. I like that they pretty much block all ambient sound around you so you don’t need active noise cancelling. I got the matte black and love them!
customer_reviews.author: GoldenTiger

customer_reviews.title: An update to an old review
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. Bad technology overall, in the end, returned after only a month or so of usage. It is just not worth the money (not cheap at all). Left earbud keeps cutting off, eventually stopped working completely. Wouldn't recommend. Instead of watching YouTube videos, check some comments on Reddit or similar pages; that is where the really troublesome gems are commented. Wish I did that initially.
customer_reviews.author: TNT

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for running and sport
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones. they are perfect for running and don't fall out. I like that I can control my music with them. The only downside is that it is hard to just use one of the ear buds. When listening to audiobooks in bed I don't always want both headphones in but if you take one out the book stops playing. But this is only a slight drawback. For sports and phone calls they are brilliant.
customer_reviews.author: Abbie

customer_reviews.title: Good sound and noise quality but connection cuts out
customer_reviews.text: I like these earphones. The sound quality is good (if not overly loud) and tuned to your ears using the app. Noise cancellation will cut out most background noise but a little will still be audible. The fit is comfortable and earphones stay in place during exercise, to a point. My main issue with these is, for some reason, every time I turn my head to look over my right shoulder, like when I am crossing a road, the connection breaks. I have tried all the rubber inserts and have the same issue.
customer_reviews.author: Mr C.

customer_reviews.title: They loose signal. They are just cr..p or faulty.
customer_reviews.text: I hate giving negative feedback and normally I tend not to write anything rather than grumble but this £175 wireless ear buds are loosing signal. My mobile phone is sometimes less than 1m away from me and I loose signal. What is the point of great sound quality when I cant hear anything, what is the point of moisture wicking! I'm concediring sending them back.
customer_reviews.author: Pawel

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I bought these after reading numerous reviews and was losing battery life with my iPods. Battery life is excellent but can’t get excited about anything else. Sound was always a bit dull and muffled and I tried every setting. Buttons are very sensitive and it’s easy to trigger commands without meaning to. To cap it all after a week I was walking with them in when one fell out. Due to the roundness of the ear buds I watched in horror as it bounced along and underneath a fence into a building site never to be seen again. What a waste. Back to apple
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Good product but not for small ears!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, excellent Bluetooth connection. The earbud is a bit heavy in my opinion and it can be uncomfortable sometimes. Despite having a great sound and with no nosing cancelling sometimes it seems it has a noise cancelling. Baterry life is excellent I've charged only once a week! In general is a good product! My wife tried for 3 days and it didn't fit properly into her ears too...
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Chou

customer_reviews.title: Known left earbud problems and falling out
customer_reviews.text: Pros - the sound is very good quality and the app lets you tune them to your preference Cons - known problem with left earbud keeps disconnecting. Support tell your to do resets and updates which takes hours and still didn’t resolve the issue. Internet full of comments about users with the same problem. For this reason alone I would buy and have returned mine. Finally, no matter what I did or which ear gel I used, the left ear kept falling out during calls and on a long call they would both fall out. I never had this problem with my old AirPods.
customer_reviews.author: uptonwarrior

customer_reviews.title: Faulty headphones and very bad packaging!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to give the Amazon Warehouse used products a try and unfortunately, my first experience was really bad! Although the earbuds' condition was stated "very good", they just don't work. First, the left one was not working but after turning it off and on it was fixed. And then the right bud started to drop to almost not audible. The conection was also loose. Also, the packaging was not good at all. The heaphones arrived dirty and clearly used. I'm returning them and going to try a brand new pair. It sounds like they have a retively good quality. But It would be very disappointing if the new ones come with the same technical issues.
customer_reviews.author: Hosein

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and great sound
customer_reviews.text: I had the 65t headphones which were great and upgraded to these when I lost my previous set. Sound quality is great, and improved from earlier version. Great fit and they look stylish. They have upgraded charge to USB C and improved the charging case. All round a great set of headphones. I use them everyday and they get heavy usage and the battery life is fab.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: jabra  elite 7t
customer_reviews.text: bought two pairs of these.best ones ive used.had to send one pair back though as the left earbud keept dropping connection and was hit or miss with charging the left one.but i returned them hastle free and ordered another pair all good with booth pairs now.tried samsung buds,beats and bose but they dont compare to these especially with battery life
customer_reviews.author: k h john

customer_reviews.title: Easily better than AirPods Pro!!
customer_reviews.text: Used to have AirPods Pro in short they wouldn’t stay in for long whether working out or chewing would be a test in itself.... The Jabra Elite Active 75’ sound better out of the box and that’s before you tune them to your own sound they’re also comfortable and stay in when working out! The Jabra’s also have zero lag with youtube / Netflix app’s which was one of my prime concerns
customer_reviews.author: G. Francisco

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: These are not the cheapest but do what it says on the box. I am very happy with the product, they fit comfortably in my ears and stay in. I use them for conference calls on Zoom and Teams and for listening to music. The sound is great and I have no complaints from users at the other end when talking to them. Battery life is about 6 hours. I am very happy and would have no issue in recommending them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing for the price
customer_reviews.text: Biggest problem with these are staying in your ears, no matter what size bud or mix they just don't hold even just normal jogging. Also intermittent left bud also so all in all disappointed
customer_reviews.author: R. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are the first pair of headphones I have purchased. I have mainly used them for running. The noise cancellation is great and makes a big difference with wind cancellation when running. Sound quality is really good as well. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: S bailey

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect.
customer_reviews.text: They look amazing and they sound absolutely fantastic, but that’s where it ends. It says in the box they are tested for secure active fit, but if I’m honest I’d have to say the 65t version are way more secure in the ears than these. It’s a pity they fall out easily because they are simply amazing earbuds minus a secure fit.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Ok, Bit Expensive, Messy to Use - Good Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: They are ok, fitting in the ear is sometimes difficult, but they are quite comfortable. When switching between telephone and laptop they dont always do it correctly or consistently and that can be a pain. Sound quality quite good, but the controls are too complicated. However, better than most I have tried however.
customer_reviews.author: Steve5839

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth Drop Outs
customer_reviews.text: These Earbuds have a much better sound than the 65t in my opinion , but like the 65Ts, I experienced Bluetooth drop outs, even though the 75Ts run Bluetooth 5.0 also the phone I was listening on (IPhone 8) has Bluetooth 5.0. The connection was ok indoors, but when I was walking outdoors the Drop Outs happened, so I returned the Earbuds for this reason.
customer_reviews.author: Blue65

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, they stay in place all the way.
customer_reviews.text: These tiny earphones are really comfortable to wear. The sound is pretty amazing too. It seems impossible they can hold a microphone there as well. I got mine in Mint colour and they are so nice they look like earrings! It’s true that there is a learning curve when it comes to the buttons and the functions you can trigger with them. But after some practice they just come naturally now. If you wear them while doing sports they will stay with you all the time, as heavy as your workout is, while having the peace of mind of knowing they are protected against dust and water or sweat. What else I can say? I just love them!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful looking product
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful looking product especially as it's in gold which I love, and the colour of my earrings. They fitted in very well. However, I couldn't get to grips with the buttons on each year which I found hard to use so I sent it back for a refund. I also think the L and R on each ear is way too faint to see easily.
customer_reviews.author: WaterDrinker

customer_reviews.title: The best by far
customer_reviews.text: I went through every review before buying these, so glad I did as these are amazing, the sound quality it unbelievable, the bass and clarity is something else, all tastes of music plays as it should, battery lasts forever, stop looking at all the reviews and get these, you won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous sound, but no different from the Elite 75t
customer_reviews.text: Really great sound & super battery life, but I don’t understand what makes them any different to the Elite 75t to make them ‘active’. Also one thing to note is that if you turn a light switch on with these in or walk close to a TV you get really bad electrical interference. Overall they are great headphones but the interference is a big fault for me
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Bose Snob Converted
customer_reviews.text: I have had every Bose Sound Sport they have made - these little mites surprisingly blow them out of the water - a fuller more detailed and louder sound in every way - I had ordered the new Bose Sport but was sadly left unimpressed - there is no comparison... I'm converted.... Bye bye Bose
customer_reviews.author: alexsubway

customer_reviews.title: Would be my daily driver if not for a couple of flaws
customer_reviews.text: Pros +Excellent sound, probably best of any in-ear headphone I've ever used +Good features expected for higher-end earbuds (e.g. lets ambient noise through, pause when taken out etc) +Responsive buttons that don't require too much force Cons -Cannot use left earbud by itself which is a problem because... -They get pretty uncomfortable. Though the tips sit in the ear nicely, the plastic body of the earbud exerts an uncomfortable amount of pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Terrible call quality
customer_reviews.text: Call quality is terrible, when calling in the street, people hang up because they don't get a word of what I am saying "feels like I am calling from a flying helicopter" Very disppointing
customer_reviews.author: julien

customer_reviews.title: Get the fit right for you with the various ear gels.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound Inc base, you probably will need to lower the base with an equaliser like on Spotify, try the different ear gels for a perfect fit, you may find one size fits one ear and the opposite ear needs one of a larger or smaller size, they work great, best Jabra sound so far, with easy controls.
customer_reviews.author: colin

customer_reviews.title: Poor sound quality and very good noise cancellation
customer_reviews.text: I really didn’t like the sound quality of these buds. Though they fit great in the ears and had an amazing battery life plus a very good noise cancellation feature, I just couldn’t keep them. Having previously used the beats pro and the jaybirds, these earbuds do not offer a great sound quality. The app has several sound options and yet I just couldn’t find anything that I really enjoyed. Finally, I returned them and I am just waiting for my refund. I wouldn’t recommend it if the sound quality is what you are looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Edo tensei

customer_reviews.title: Useless if you have poor earring
customer_reviews.text: Completely useless if you have bad hearing I have a pair of earbuds that cost less than £50 that I can hear better with and the sound is far better than these. There is no way these are worth the extortionate price they are.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Earbuds
customer_reviews.text: These buds are almost perfect if it wasn't for few minor problems. good: - the sound quality is genuinely good, much better than some of its competitors , overall the sound is very detailed and crystal clear across the range. still might be bit too base heavy for some but can be tune using the app. - very comfortable and secure fit, good for running -good microphone for call. not so good: -randomly loses its signal, the app does not always recognise the headset.
customer_reviews.author: brendon83

customer_reviews.title: Rubbish do no stress your self out with this useless crap
customer_reviews.text: Really wanted to like this product but sadly it’s a piece o crap ,complete carnage
customer_reviews.author: Mr. D. A. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Left Earbud Will Fail!
customer_reviews.text: Left earbud failed, was too quiet in sound and kept cutting out, just owned for a few weeks. Also there's interference in traffic sometimes. Returned back to Amazon for refund. I honestly also don't see why these are £169 when they aren't even on the same level as the Sony or senheissers momentum ones when I tried them in-store demo.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: These are super luxurious high quality buds. The Jabra app is great too. Battery life is stunning. They pair easily with all devices. Small criticism they feel they might fall out my ear sometimes still experimenting with bud sizes. Wear them when I go jogging, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A big disappointment
customer_reviews.text: The positives are good sound and great battery life but the connectivity is awful. They frequently disconnect themselves and shut off, they are easily influenced by any external electrical interference from things like the doors on the Tube, other peoples phones etc and if I had my phone in my jeans pocket the range could be insufficient to reach the buds. I've just raised a customer return, very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Matt J

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, good sound, easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had a few different Bluetooth headsets over the years but this was my first true wireless pair and I’m impressed. I got these specifically for the size as I use them primarily at the gym and when laying in bed to listen to music. They fit great and sound really good. A bit bassy, but the Jabra app does let you tweak the sound profiles and is very easy to use. In a couple of years when Jabra get these even smaller and even more water resistant I’ll upgrade. I’ll continue to quietly look down on all those who bought AirPods instead of these, because those who really want great audio and features would definitely buy the Jabra. 👍
customer_reviews.author: FlashForward

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using for a couple of weeks for running and so far, is doing the job. Sync amazingly easy with my phone and my Garmin watch. Hear through is good, special when I'm using for running and doing exercise while my two little girls are screaming near me, but I still can concentrate at my exercises. Battery life is really, in my case that only use a couple of minutes during the week, I haven’t charged yet as the battery still full. Let’s see how will be once I’m back to work and use for conference call.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best truly wireless earbuds on the market!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a few pairs of earbuds including mifo, mini rings pro and echo buds and these are by far the best. Rich in sound quality highs, lows and very good bass. You can change the sound to how you want in the app. Are these worth the price? Simple yes!!! These are fantastic truly wireless earbuds. Also stay in my ears well. Pay the extra £20 something for the active pair. I hope you enjoy 😊
customer_reviews.author: James C.

customer_reviews.title: The sound is quite tinny.
customer_reviews.text: Personally I found the sound to be quite tinny. It wasn't nearly as clear and bright as I had thought it might be, even when placed into 'energise' settings on the app. The base was good however listening to something like Damien Rice Eskimo Friend was not a pleasurable experience. For £180 I would expect a higher standard that I can achieve from a wired apple earphone. The customizations and the general use are great, I didnt find the fit to stay in my ear that well though.
customer_reviews.author: Freddy Gaffney

customer_reviews.title: Risks
customer_reviews.text: -Do not get these if you are likely to loose them. The "Find my Jabra" feature does not work accurately. If you loose the right earbud, the left one becomes obsolete as it does not function independently. Better method of locating lost earbuds definitely required! -Mic could be better wheb on call, especially outdoors. -Have fallen out my ears a good couple of times whilst running. Otherwise, great pair of earbuds, sound quality is up there too, and the app is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Mazen Abdo

customer_reviews.title: Purely phenomenal
customer_reviews.text: These are phenomenal....incredible quality, great features, secure and the sound is so immersive. I’ve had AirPods Pro and these are so so much better. Don’t be put off by the lack of Active Noise Cancellation...they fit so well you don’t need it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Ward

customer_reviews.title: Jabra 75t Review
customer_reviews.text: Quality feel look nice and compact. Charging case neat and compact fits in a pocket. Gripe is not straight from the box needed charging and updating through app. Great fit to my ears when apple earphones always fall out. Sound quality good but needs more bass overall very satisfied and would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good wireless buds
customer_reviews.text: I am enjoying getting to know these headphones. The sound quality is very good and they look slick and are comfortable in the ear. The battery life is good for what I require and the case charges up impressively quickly so if you do run out, it won't be for long. One drawback I am having to get used to is that I use an android phone and they will often connect for calls only as opposed to calls and audio, so you need to be sure audio is connected else it will come out loud from your phone speaker. I have never had wireless buds before though so this may just be what always happens.
customer_reviews.author: mesco

customer_reviews.title: Decent wireless earbuds.
customer_reviews.text: They work! Pity you have to set them up and upload /download software & firmware. Still, once done, sound quality is good and you also have a selection of ambient sounds to help you chill. All in all, not cheap, you get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.author: Mr K Riley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent ear buds for the price
customer_reviews.text: These blew me away they sound as if you are in a club and if you like that sound of hard thumping bass these are the ones for you. They are so comfortable to wear and have passive noise cancellation so they block about 80% of the outside noise compared to total noise cancellation. I have owned AirPods Pro and these sound ten times better than them. The app is very easy to use and comes with different pre set settings for different sound profiles and again they sound tremendous. A must buy.
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: Top notch
customer_reviews.text: Top notch. I have a bunch of good quality *wired* earphones. This is my first venture into wireless, and I'm very pleased. Sound quality is deep and rich; calls are crystal clear. Bought after watching several earbud reviews on YouTube. Not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: RN

customer_reviews.title: Great little buds
customer_reviews.text: Great product from a well known brand, good ear fitment, comfortable to wear. I have used them for sometime and sound especially bass is very pronounced. Battery life is really good with the charging case. Great product no issues so far
customer_reviews.author: Imy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic item.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleasantly surprised by these. Took a few attempts to get the sound quality right but they are as good as wired ones.best bit is they are so compact, stay in my ears and are simple to use. The designers of these need a pat on the back.
customer_reviews.author: Peter S

customer_reviews.title: Great earbuds
customer_reviews.text: Customisable buttons (latest software update) Good fit & secure for running No active noise cancellation but good sound isolation However, able to turn on 'hearthrough' to hear external sounds Able to pair more than one device Good battery life Look good Good sound quality, equaliser via app
customer_reviews.author: schwinglo

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: For me these weren't comfortable at all, I tried both the regular tips, inair and comply tips but they got very uncomfortable after 10-15 mins Apart from the comfort which is a totally personal preference, these performed well for music playback and audio calls however there was some lag when watching video
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Bought to use with my phone and my laptop for video calling. Reviews said it would work as intended, it doesn't. Doesn’t work as an Input/ output device with a Windows 10 laptop without buying an additional £50 Bluetooth dongle. Lovely bit of kit, fits well, would be great for exercising, pass through not as good as advertised as you still get a hiss. Returned with regret. Not fit for my purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Hopeful

customer_reviews.title: Very good sports earphones, battery can run down if not careful
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with these in general, with the noise cancellation and sound fidelity being exceptional. However the quoted battery life I haven't seen yet. Found it was mainly due to connection to multiple devices at once, as well use the HearThrough function. With both switched off, the battery life extends significantly. Getting used to the comfort aspect was hard, but once you twist them in correctly, they're exceptionally comfy for extended periods.
customer_reviews.author: Sean O'Halloran

customer_reviews.title: Elite Active 75T: Very Impressed, Improvement over 65Ts
customer_reviews.text: This comes from the owner of a pair of Elite Active 65Ts for the best part of a year. The sound of the *Active* 75Ts is much more refined - more responsive bass and about 20% louder overall than the 65Ts. Much better fit than the 65Ts (which were pretty good in my ears to begin with) - you hardly notice these in your ears. If you are considering between 65s and 75s this is a no-brainer, go for the 75s!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Goodliffe

product_meta.title: Jabra Elite Active 75t Earbuds – Passive Noise Cancelling True Wireless Life for Calls and Music – Titanium Black
product_meta.description:
Style Name:Sports| Colour Name:Black TitaniumJabra Elite Active 75t earbuds
4-microphone technology is proven to deliver superior wireless call performance by creating a noise-blocking zone. The comfortable, fitted eargels are perfect for calls and music on-the-go. Want to customise your sound? No problem with Jabra MyControls, giving users the option to use just one earbud and programmable buttons and Jabra MySound, for individualized audio based on the user’s personal hearing profile. And stay aware of what is happening around you with the HearThrough feature to filter in the sounds that surround you. Voice assistant enabled; choose your voice assistant to quickly get you the information you need. And with the integrated voice command set appointments, make calls, find nearby events or have messages read back to you. Get up to 7.5 hours of music and talk-time with the earbuds and amazing 28 hours with the charging case.

Product features:
– Wireless range: Up to 10 metres
– Charging time: Up to 2 hours and 20 minutes
– 15 minutes rapid charge in charging case provides up to 1 hour of battery life
– Fitted silicone eargels
– Bluetooth 5.0 standard
– IP57 waterproof and sweatproof

Jabra
Whoever you are, wherever you go, there’s a Jabra product that’s designed with you in mind. It’s what we do.
THOUGHTFULLY DESIGNED. PURPOSEFULLY ENGINEERED. EXPERTLY BUILT.
feature_bullets: Designed for secure fit and amazing durability: Ergonomic shape makes eargels exceptionally comfortable and the ideal fit for every type of ear – IP57 rating means fully waterproof and sweatproof

Long battery life and true wireless stability: With up to 28 hours of battery time with the pocket-friendly charging case, the Elite Active 75t earphones let you take calls and play music while staying connected
Passive noise cancellation: Advanced 4-microphone technology removes unwanted noise from calls – Enjoy incredible conversation quality with the noise-blocking zone
Personlise everything with the new MySound and MyControls features: Individualize your sound based on your own hearing and program the buttons to your specific needs
Scope of delivery: Jabra Elite Active 75t earbuds, charging case, USB-C charging cable, 3 sets of silicon eargels – Colour: Black Titanium

specifications.Delivery information:: We cannot deliver certain products outside mainland UK ( ). We will only be able to confirm if this product can be delivered to your chosen address when you enter your delivery address at checkout.
specifications.Customer reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
